Celeron regain conciousness.  Again he could not account for the 
loss of time, almost 70 megacycles had passed and he could not 
recall what had happened.  He looked around and saw that he was 
still in the engine room of that ship, the engine he had been 
working on was repaired almost fully.  This was greatly disturbing 
to him.  He decided to leave that room and look around to see if his 
captors were still about....
